dict.acceptation: 知觉；觉察（力）；观念；（农作物的）收获；

sent.orig: In aesthetic perception, the perception of visual perception and auditory perception are the two most important.
sent.trans: 在审美感知中，视知觉和听知觉是两种最主要的感知。

sent.orig: Perception is collective and individual; personal perception is much easier to change than group perception.
sent.trans: 感知是群体的，也是个体的。

sent.orig: Intuition is not subliminal perception; it is subtle perception and learning—knowing without knowing that you know.
sent.trans: 直觉并非下意识的感知，它是精细微妙的感知与学习，是在不知不觉中明白你如何明白的关键。

sent.orig: For perception implies a body perceived and a body in which perception takes place.
sent.trans: 因为感觉蕴含者可被感觉的物体和感觉于其中发生的物体。

sent.orig: They embody spiritual perception and visual perception.
sent.trans: 它们包含了精神感知层面和视觉感知层面。
